metadata.title: CVE-2018-6192 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Artifex MuPDF 1.12.0, the pdf_read_new_xref function in pdf/pdf-xref.callows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentationviolation and application crash) via a crafted pdf file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
